revised_title: Botanical Discoveries and Uses of Indian Plants
tldr: In a letter to fellow Royal Society member, Mr. James Petiver describes and discusses various Indian plants' names, descriptions, and uses. He provides information on their medicinal properties, such as treating dysentery, expelling wind, curing aches, and treating various skin conditions. Petiver also mentions the plants' local uses, such as being considered sacred or used in witchcraft remedies.
